_meta.title: Health & Wellness 건강운
_meta.description: Holistic wellness guidance through tarot - mind, body, and spirit balance
_meta.disclaimer: For entertainment and self-reflection only. Always consult healthcare professionals for medical concerns.

The Fool.health_meaning: Fresh start in health matters. New exercise routine, diet change, or lifestyle shift. Approach wellness with beginner's mind.
The Fool.korean: 건강 문제에서 새로운 시작. 새로운 운동 루틴, 식단 변경, 또는 생활 방식 변화.
The Fool.physical: Try new forms of movement. Your body craves novelty and adventure.
The Fool.mental: Release old mental patterns. Fresh perspective on wellbeing.
The Fool.energy: High energy for new beginnings. Enthusiasm supports health goals.
The Fool.advice: Start fresh with your health. Don't let past failures hold you back.

The Magician.health_meaning: You have the power to transform your health. Mind over matter. Your intention shapes your physical reality.
The Magician.korean: 건강을 변화시킬 힘이 있습니다. 정신이 물질을 지배합니다.
The Magician.physical: Use your skills and knowledge for health improvement. You know what to do.
The Magician.mental: Mental discipline strengthens physical health. Visualize wellness.
The Magician.energy: Strong vital energy. Channel it productively.
The Magician.advice: You have all the tools for health. Use them with focused intention.

The High Priestess.health_meaning: Listen to your body's wisdom. Intuition guides health choices. Hidden health matters may need attention.
The High Priestess.korean: 몸의 지혜에 귀를 기울이세요. 직감이 건강 선택을 안내합니다.
The High Priestess.physical: Trust body signals. Subtle symptoms deserve attention.
The High Priestess.mental: Connect with subconscious patterns affecting health.
The High Priestess.energy: Tune into your energy cycles. Rest when needed.
The High Priestess.advice: Your body knows what it needs. Be still and listen.

The Empress.health_meaning: Nurture yourself. Self-care is essential. Fertility and feminine health highlighted. Nature heals.
The Empress.korean: 자신을 돌보세요. 자기 관리가 필수입니다. 출산력과 여성 건강이 강조됩니다.
The Empress.physical: Nourish your body with good food. Connect with nature for healing.
The Empress.energy: Abundance of life force. Creative energy flows.
The Empress.advice: Treat your body like a garden. Nurture it with love and care.

The Emperor.health_meaning: Structure and discipline in health routines. Take control of your wellness. Establish healthy boundaries.
The Emperor.korean: 건강 루틴에서의 구조와 규율. 웰빙을 통제하세요. 건강한 경계를 설정하세요.
The Emperor.physical: Structured exercise and diet plans work well now.
The Emperor.advice: Take charge of your health with structure and discipline.

The Hierophant.health_meaning: Traditional medicine or established wellness practices. Seek professional guidance. Join health communities.
The Hierophant.korean: 전통 의학 또는 확립된 웰빙 관행. 전문적인 지도를 구하세요.
The Hierophant.physical: Consult healthcare professionals. Follow established protocols.
The Hierophant.mental: Traditional therapies or counseling may help.
The Hierophant.energy: Group activities and community support wellness.
The Hierophant.advice: Seek guidance from health professionals and established practices.

The Lovers.health_meaning: Mind-body harmony. Health choices that align with your values. Relationship health matters.
The Lovers.korean: 심신의 조화. 가치관에 맞는 건강 선택. 관계 건강 문제.
The Lovers.physical: Choose health practices that feel right for YOU.
The Lovers.mental: Align thoughts and actions for mental peace.
The Lovers.energy: Balance between giving and receiving energy.
The Lovers.advice: Choose health practices that align with your deepest values.

The Chariot.health_meaning: Willpower drives health success. Overcome health challenges through determination. Mind conquers body.
The Chariot.korean: 의지력이 건강 성공을 이끕니다. 결단력으로 건강 문제를 극복하세요.
The Chariot.physical: Push through physical challenges with determination.
The Chariot.advice: Your willpower is your greatest health asset. Use it.

Strength.health_meaning: Gentle, patient approach to health. Inner strength supports healing. Tame unhealthy habits with love, not force.
Strength.korean: 건강에 대한 부드럽고 인내심 있는 접근. 내면의 힘이 치유를 지원합니다.
Strength.physical: Patient, consistent effort brings results. Gentle movement.
Strength.mental: Calm, compassionate approach to mental health.
Strength.advice: Heal with patience and self-compassion, not force.

The Hermit.health_meaning: Solitude supports healing. Rest and reflection needed. Inner wisdom guides health choices.
The Hermit.korean: 고독이 치유를 지원합니다. 휴식과 성찰이 필요합니다.
The Hermit.physical: Rest and recovery time needed. Slow down.
The Hermit.mental: Introspection supports mental health. Quiet time heals.
The Hermit.advice: Sometimes healing requires stepping back and going inward.

Wheel of Fortune.health_meaning: Health cycles are changing. What goes down will come up. Adapt to health changes.
Wheel of Fortune.korean: 건강 순환이 바뀌고 있습니다. 내려간 것은 올라갈 것입니다.
Wheel of Fortune.physical: Health fluctuations are natural. Adapt to cycles.
Wheel of Fortune.mental: Mental state shifts. This too shall pass.
Wheel of Fortune.energy: Energy cycles. Flow with natural rhythms.
Wheel of Fortune.advice: Health cycles. Trust that difficult phases will pass.

Justice.health_meaning: Cause and effect in health. Past choices affect current wellness. Balance is needed.
Justice.korean: 건강에서의 원인과 결과. 과거 선택이 현재 웰빙에 영향을 미칩니다.
Justice.physical: Body responds to how you treat it. Fair exchange.
Justice.mental: Mental balance through right thinking and action.
Justice.advice: Your body responds to how you treat it. Choose wisely.

The Hanged Man.health_meaning: Pause for health. See wellness from new perspective. Surrender to healing process.
The Hanged Man.korean: 건강을 위한 일시정지. 새로운 관점에서 웰빙을 보세요.
The Hanged Man.physical: Forced rest may be needed. Surrender to body's needs.
The Hanged Man.mental: New perspective on mental health. Let go of old views.
The Hanged Man.energy: Energy in suspension. Wait for renewal.
The Hanged Man.advice: Sometimes healing requires surrender, not action.

Death.health_meaning: End of unhealthy patterns. Health transformation. Let go of what harms you.
Death.korean: 건강하지 못한 패턴의 끝. 건강 변화. 해로운 것을 놓아주세요.
Death.physical: End unhealthy habits. Body transforms and renews.
Death.mental: Release old mental patterns that harm health.
Death.energy: Old energy patterns die. New vitality emerges.
Death.advice: Let unhealthy patterns die. Your health can be reborn.

Temperance.health_meaning: Balance and moderation heal. Integrate different health approaches. Patience in recovery.
Temperance.korean: 균형과 절제가 치유합니다. 다양한 건강 접근 방식을 통합하세요.
Temperance.physical: Moderation in all things. Balanced nutrition and exercise.
Temperance.mental: Emotional balance supports health. Integrate all aspects.
Temperance.advice: Healing comes through balance, moderation, and integration.

The Devil.health_meaning: Examine health addictions and bondage. Unhealthy attachments harm wellness. Break free.
The Devil.korean: 건강 중독과 속박을 검토하세요. 건강하지 못한 집착이 웰빙을 해칩니다.
The Devil.mental: Examine mental patterns that trap you in poor health.
The Devil.advice: Name what chains you to poor health. Freedom is possible.

The Tower.health_meaning: Sudden health changes or revelations. Health crisis leads to awakening. Breakdown before breakthrough.
The Tower.korean: 갑작스러운 건강 변화 또는 발견. 건강 위기가 각성으로 이어집니다.
The Tower.physical: Sudden physical changes or symptoms. Wake-up call.
The Tower.mental: Mental health crisis may precede transformation.
The Tower.energy: Energy disruption. Rebuild from ground up.
The Tower.advice: Health crises can be catalysts for profound positive change.

The Star.health_meaning: Healing and hope. Recovery after illness. Body and spirit renew. Light returns.
The Star.korean: 치유와 희망. 질병 후 회복. 몸과 정신이 새로워집니다.
The Star.physical: Physical healing progresses. Recovery is underway.
The Star.advice: Keep hope alive. Healing is happening, even when you can't see it.

The Moon.health_meaning: Hidden health issues. Trust body intuition. Mental health and subconscious patterns.
The Moon.korean: 숨겨진 건강 문제. 몸의 직감을 신뢰하세요. 정신 건강과 잠재의식 패턴.
The Moon.physical: Get symptoms checked. Hidden issues may exist.
The Moon.mental: Address anxiety, depression, or subconscious patterns.
The Moon.advice: Trust your body's signals, even when they're subtle.

The Sun.health_meaning: Vitality and joy. Health thrives. Energy radiates. Celebrate wellbeing.
The Sun.korean: 활력과 기쁨. 건강이 번창합니다. 에너지가 발산됩니다.
The Sun.physical: Physical health at a high point. Vitality shines.
The Sun.mental: Mental clarity and joy. Positive outlook.
The Sun.advice: Embrace and celebrate your health. Joy itself is medicine.

Judgement.health_meaning: Health awakening. Answer the call to better wellness. Review past health choices.
Judgement.korean: 건강 각성. 더 나은 웰빙에 대한 부름에 응답하세요.
Judgement.physical: Body calls for change. Answer with action.
Judgement.mental: Mental health awakening. Rise to a new level.
Judgement.advice: Answer the call to transform your health. Rise.

The World.health_meaning: Health wholeness and completion. Integrated wellness. Body, mind, spirit in harmony.
The World.korean: 건강의 완전함과 완성. 통합된 웰빙. 몸, 마음, 정신의 조화.
The World.advice: You can achieve complete wellness. Wholeness is your birthright.

body_systems.wands_fire: Nervous system, inflammation, energy levels, fever, blood
body_systems.cups_water: Emotions, lymphatic system, kidneys, reproductive, hydration
body_systems.swords_air: Lungs, breathing, nervous system, headaches, mental health
body_systems.pentacles_earth: Bones, muscles, skin, digestion, physical body, weight
